title: About the project
introduction: Would you like to learn more about all that cool artwork at Prague's metro stations? UMetra - our interactive map of metro lines A, B, C will serve you as an art guide through Prague's most iconic public transport, concerning paintings, sculptures, mosaics, reliefs and other installations placed in public space. The website will contain interesting information and lovely photos of each piece of art placed in vestibules and their closest neighbourhood.
